trans-unit.source: Represents the AudienceRestriction element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.5.1.4].
trans-unit.target: 表示在 [Saml2Core，2.5.1.4] 中指定的 AudienceRestriction 元素。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is empty, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>集合为空，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>将在序列化过程中引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类表示的元素的详细信息，请参阅 SAML&2;.0 版核心规范。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class with no Audience elements.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref>不含任何受众元素的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> property is initialized to an empty collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class with the specified URIs.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref>类具有指定的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized using the elements of the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>集合初始化使用指定的集合中的元素。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref:System.Uri> that contains the Audience elements contained in this restriction.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref:System.Uri>，其中包含此限制中包含的受众元素。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized with the specified Audience element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>使用指定的 Audience 元素初始化集合。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the contents of the Audience element contained in this restriction.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>表示包含在此限制的受众元素的内容。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of URIs that specifies the audiences to which the assertion is addressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定断言针对向其受众的 Uri 的集合。

trans-unit.source: The condition is valid if the relying party is a member of any of the specified audiences.
trans-unit.target: 条件是信赖方的任何指定的受众成员是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The Audience elements contained by the AudienceRestriction element.
trans-unit.target: 包含由 AudienceRestriction 元素的 Audience 元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection of type <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the audiences.
